titleInfo.title: A remark on simultaneous inclusions of the zeros of a polynomial by Gershgorin's theorem

mods.abstract: By using Gershgorin's theorem and the theorems on minimal Gershgorin disks a posteriori error bounds for the zeros of a polynomial are deduced, from which the bounds given in [1] by Braess and Hadeler are easily obtained.
